answerText: electric polarizability (do not accept "polarization" or anything else)[10] This theory classifies molecules based on whether they are larger and more polarizable or smaller and less polarizable.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Editors 4 | 12 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name this quantity which measures how much an atom or molecule will develop a dipole moment in response to an external electric field.
